snippet.title: Beta MAX Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Use four-dimensional thinking to manipulate time and navigate through this mind bending retro inspired realm.
Solve puzzles to help Max find his way home in this atmospheric first-person puzzle platformer.

Wishlist now on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2216250/Beta_MAX

#puzzle #timetravel #synthwave #retro #platformer #indie
